text: aur jo kuch Allah taâ€™ala ne tujhe de rakha hai, us mein se aaqirath ke ghar ki talaash bhi rakh aur apne dunyaawi hisse ko bhi na bhol aur jaise ke Allah ne tere saath ehsaan kiya hai, tu bhi accha sulook kar aur mulk mein fasaadh ka qaaha na ho, yaqeen maan, ke Allah mufsido ko na pasand rakhta hai
